original_title: ROH: Best of American Super Juniors Tournament
overview: Best of American Super Juniors Tournament was a wrestling event promoted by Ring of Honor. It took place on April 2, 2005 at the Convention Hall in Asbury Park, New Jersey. The show feature a one night eight-man tournament made up of ROH and New Japan wrestlers, with the winner competing in New Japan Pro Wrestling's annual Super J tournament.
title: ROH: Best of American Super Juniors Tournament
